formattedAddress: 3 W 57th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 3 W 57th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: This is the worst management company I have ever dealt with and I have lived in NYC for 7 years. Entire building smells like smoke. Packages are being stolen. Construction has been going on in the apartment above ours for months and they do not have a permit. Annette Fobbs is the most incompetent person I have ever dealt with. Beyond ignoring most complaints, she can't read or spell well at all. This make it almost impossible to get her to do her job. I don't think she could if she wanted to. And she clearly does not want to.

originalText.text: Formerly SC Management and the WORST landlord in NYC. I lived in one of their buildings on the upper east side it was a great unit and location. However, the super Ara was aggressive, getting up in tenants faces screaming at them and not being responsive to issues like loss of heat/hot water, mice, roaches, and the list goes on. When dealing with the office Annette Fobbs couldn‚Äôt be more incompetent, unpleasant to speak with, or worse at her job. She was unable to respond to issues or address in a timely manner such as the 10+ months without an elevator, broken washer for 6 months, and a mice infestation for 6 months. Our rent increased 22% this last year with no explanation or correction to the ongoing issues only to be told by Arlene their broker that our apartment is priced too high and not in line with the market. They lost our rent check several times and couldn‚Äôt get responses of how best to handle and needing to cancel checks and re-send multiple times. When moving out they kept trying to charge us for non- relevant fees. Everything with this management company was always a fight- not worth it to  live in one of their buildings. If i could give 0 stars for the rating I would.

If i could give 0 stars for the rating I would.
